alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; De Kalb; Gentry; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doniphan, northeastern Buchanan, southern Gentry, southeastern Holt, Andrew and DeKalb Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Savannah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Maysville, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Oregon, Stewartsville, Union Star, Amazonia, Clarksdale, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Denton and Rosendale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 44 and 75. Interstate 229 between mile markers 2 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Missouri.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; De Kalb; Gentry; Holt
